comment.author: 21641427@N00
comment._content: "The painting, commissioned by the Congregation of St Jerome of Charity for the church of the same name in Via Giulia in Rome, was executed by Domenichino between 1611 and 1614. The Bolognese painter had come to this city in 1602 called by his fellow citizen Annibale Carracci, with whom he worked in the Farnese Gallery." mv.vatican.va/3_EN/pages/x-Schede/PINs/PINs_Sala12_02_048...
